body:
On master (ee7e06156357c333caef381b6acb3109d0187666) build tools for native packages are set to [defaults](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/ee7e06156357c333caef381b6acb3109d0187666/depends/builders/default.mk#L1-L8), even when such a tool is not available in the system by its default name:
```
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends print-native_b2_cxx CC=clang CXX=clang++
native_b2_cxx=g++
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends print-native_capnp_cxx MULTIPROCESS=1 CC=clang CXX=clang++
native_capnp_cxx=g++
```

The resulted problems are:
```
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends native_b2 CC=clang CXX=clang++
Building native_b2...
B2_TOOLSET is gcc, but the 'gcc' command cannot be executed.
Make sure 'gcc' is in PATH, or use a different toolset.
make: *** [funcs.mk:281: /home/hebasto/GitHub/bitcoin/depends/work/build/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/native_b2/1_71_0-793eacf1f74/tools/build/src/engine/.stamp_built] Error 1
```

This PR fixes this issue by propagating well-known variables (CC, CXX etc) to native packages.

With this PR:
```
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends print-native_b2_cxx CC=clang CXX=clang++
native_b2_cxx=clang++
$ make --no-print-directory -C depends print-native_capnp_cxx MULTIPROCESS=1 CC=clang CXX=clang++
native_capnp_cxx=clang++
```

This PR is an alternative to bitcoin/bitcoin#23551, and it is a more general solution.
title: build: Propagate user-defined tools to native packages
